description: This file defines a React Native component named NoteCard that displays a summarized view of a note, including title, category, preview content, and last updated date. It utilizes styling via StyleSheet and theme context to render a styled, interactive card component in a note-taking application.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: Functional React component that renders a stylized card displaying note details, including title, category, preview of content, and last updated date with press handling.
